name: Absit Omen Part II
description:
After the events in Absit Omen Part I, Alice finds herself in political turmoil in the wake of Cleris' capture. People distrust and hate her, Empyreans turn to her for the future. She finds a greater and spiritual purpose along the chaos she endures.

Elsa is captured as well but an escape is in motion. Sorros helps those out on the street after his nightly performances. The world needs the help of some unconventional heroes.

Made in half a month for a 1gameamonth challenge.
